name: Messier 31
description:
In Messier 31 you control a spaceship searching for new resources in the deepiest areas of galaxy, but it seems there're others strange forms of life doing the same and prepared to fight for it at all cost.

Messier 31 is a game developed in 30 days by one person (me :P) for the 9th PDJ's Game Jam. The sugested themes were "Geometric", "Minimalist" and "Action-reaction" and I tried to incorporate each one in this game. I hope you'll enjoy it!

  • ASDW / Arrows : move;
  • Mouse left : shoot;
  • ESC / P / Mouse right : pause.
